description: Join a team focused on creating real-world software solutions and gain hands-on experience with collaborative development.
Master the art of problem-solving with algorithms and data structures.
A great group for those passionate about the fundamental forces of nature.
Covers discrete structures like logic, proofs, sets, relations, and functions — the foundations of computer science.
Explores digital logic, Assembly programming, CPU organization, instruction sets, and performance evaluation.
Continues discrete structures: number theory, asymptotic notation, recurrence relations, and combinatorics.
Covers parallelism, distributed computing, concurrent programming, and scalable architectures.
Build mobile apps using modern platforms, GUI design, and event-driven programming.
Learn to build, deploy and manage cloud systems — covering infrastructure, resource management, and application models.
Focuses on Arabic grammar, meaning, and literary analysis across various genres.

course_name: Modern History of Bahrain and Citizenship
description: Explores Bahrain's history, national identity, citizenship values, and regional relations.
Introduces principles of human rights and international conventions with a Bahraini focus.
Covers Islamic beliefs, ethics, worship principles, and the cultural relationship with other societies.
